gameContent

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameContent.Card
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CardMove, CardMoveToShipping, CardPayMoney, CardReceiveMoneyFromBank, GotoJail, Legat, PardonCard, PayPropertyTax, ReceiveMoneyFromOtherPlayers, Relativemove

    public abstract class Card
extends Object
    Represents a community chest or a chance card of the Monopoly game. The concrete cards are represented as suptypes of this class.
    Author:
    Ekkart Kindler, ekki@dtu.dk
